memberdef.name: astro_map
memberdef.initializer: = { "messengerfullC": libcmalib.messengerfullC, "messengerC": libcmalib.messengerC, "gtoc1C": libcmalib.gtoc1C, "cassini1C": libcmalib.cassini1C, "cassini1minlpC": libcmalib.cassini1minlpC, "cassini2C": libcmalib.cassini2C, "rosettaC": libcmalib.rosettaC, "sagasC": libcmalib.sagasC, "tandemC": libcmalib.tandemC, "tandemCu": libcmalib.tandemCu, "cassini2minlpC": libcmalib.cassini2minlpC, }

briefdescription.para: Computes the objective function for the Cassini1MINLP optimization problem.

detaileddescription.para: This function is a wrapper that interacts with an external C function to compute the required value for a specific mathematical optimization problem. The external function is utilized for its computational efficiency and requires properly formatted inputs to execute.

para.verbatim: x (list of float): A list of input values representing variables for which the objective function needs to be evaluated.

simplesect.para: float The computed objective function value. If errors occur or the result is not finite, a default high-value penalty of 1E10 is returned.

briefdescription.para: Calculates the Delta-V, time of flight (TOF), and launch time for a spacecraft based on given input parameters.

detaileddescription.para: The function uses an external C library to compute the result and handles edge cases by returning large values for Delta-V in case of errors or invalid operations.

parameterdescription.para: A list of input parameters including launch time and trajectory parameters. The specific meaning of each value in the list depends on the mathematical requirements for calculating the Delta-V.

simplesect.para:
list A list containing:
Delta-V (float): The total change in velocity required for the spacecraft.
TOF (float): The time of flight calculated as the sum of specific parameters from the input.
Launch time (float): The initial launch time extracted from the input list.

para.verbatim: Any exception raised during function execution will be caught internally, and default large values will be returned for Delta-V and launch DV.

briefdescription.para: Converts mission parameters to their respective outputs using an external function call and computes additional metrics.

detaileddescription.para: The function calculates delta velocity (dv), time of flight (tof), and launch time based on the input parameters. It utilizes a C-based external function to compute dv. If the external function fails, it assigns a default high value to dv.

parameterdescription.para: A list of mission parameters where specific indices represent particular parameters such as launch time and other configuration values.

simplesect.para:
list A list containing:
dv (float): Delta velocity calculated from the external function.
tof (float): Total time of flight derived from the input parameters.
launch_time (float): The launch time extracted from the input

parameterdescription.para: Propagates the exception if the external function fails and logs the error, without terminating the program.

listitem.para:
This module provides implementations of various astronomical functions and optimization problems, including the Messenger, GTOC1, Cassini, Rosetta, Sagas, Tandem, and their respective configurations. It allows for the evaluation of these functions with specified bounds and sequences.
The functions are designed to be used with the Fast CMA-ES optimization algorithm, providing a way to optimize trajectories and parameters for space missions.
